name: Simple Forsaken
description:
This game was created for the Metroidvania Month 6 game jam, in collaboration with  BlueMango!

We didn't have as much time as we expected to work on the game, resulting in the game only containing the most basic features and scenery at the moment. We may continue working on the game after the dealine, raising the level of detail and adding important features such as animation and UI. More content is also planned. 

! - Extra info needed, because the game is not finished

The abilities are not explained yet, so here are the currently unlockable abilities in the order they are unlocked:

  1. Jumping
  2. Ledge grab/climbing vines
  3. Swimming
  4. Double jump

At some point you will need to insert the batteries(sphere thingy) you collect into some sockets by pressing the Interaction key [x]. They look like this:

Pressing [down] while jumping off a vine causes you to drop off instead.
